subSections.title: Chinese
subSections.text: {{zh-forms|睾|alt=睪*|note=<big>[[睪]]</big> - Orthodox form used in Taiwan}}

subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text:
* In Taiwan, <big>{{l|zh|睪}}</big> is the orthodox form while <big>睾</big> is considered as a {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant form}} ({{l|zh|異體字}}) of {{l|zh|睪}}.
* In mainland China<!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/通用規范漢字表 (2013, Character 5763, not to be considered a simplified form of 睪) --> and Hong Kong<!-- Refer http://input.foruto.com/ccc/gongbiu/dzijingbiu/doc/dzijingbiu_list.pdf (Page 34, 目部, 14畫) -->, <big>睾</big> is the orthodox form used for the pronunciation "[[gāo]]".
* In the historical {{w|Kangxi dictionary}}, the definition for [[testicle]] is provided under this character.
